query: Airport mein WiFi ka password kya hai?
expected_response: Nahi, Islamabad International Airport ka free WiFi network khula hai aur kisi password ki zaroorat nahi hai. Aap asaani se 'ISB_Airport_Free' network se connect ho sakte hain jo poore terminal mein available hai. Connection ke liye sirf apne device ki WiFi settings kholein, available networks ki list mein ISB_Airport_Free talash karein, aur us se connect hone ke liye us par tap karein. Kuch suratoon mein, aap ko ek saada terms & conditions ke page par bheja ja sakta hai jahan aap ko usage ki shartein qubool karni hongi is se pehle ke internet tak rasai faal ho. Yeh network bunyadi web browsing, email, social media, aur messaging apps ke liye munasib raftaar faraham karta hai. Connection ka waqt aam tor par 3-4 ghantay tak mahfooz rehta hai, phir aap ko dobara connect karna par sakta hai. Agar aap ko connection mein koi masla aata hai, to information desk par madad ke liye poochein jo technical support ya alternative WiFi options faraham kar sakte hain.

query: Kya airport mein namaz ki jagah hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated namaz ke kamrayموجود hain jo 24/7 khulay hain tamam musalmanon ke liye. Yeh specially designed prayer facilities doosri manzil par Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hain. Namaz ke kamray alag alag sections mein taqseem hain mardon aur aurton ke liye, har section mein proper wuzu ki suholiyat hai. Har kamra qibla ki taraf rukh kiya gaya hai aur saaf carpet se muffarash hai. Additional amenities mein shamil hain: Quran shareef ki copies, namaz ke mats agar zaroorat ho, clock jis mein namaz ke auqat dikhai dete hain, aur AC ya heating system comfortable temperature ke liye. Wuzu area mein paani ki suholiyat hai aur towels ya tissues available hain. Yeh kamray shanti aur privacy faraham karte hain takay aap apni namaz ada kar sakein. Agar aap ko namaz ke kamray dhoondhne mein mushkil ho rahi hai, to kisi bhi airport staff member se poochein ya signage follow karein jo clearly marked hai.

query: Kahan se foreign currency exchange kar sakta hoon?
expected_response: Currency exchange counters Islamabad International Airport mein multiple locations par available hain. Main exchange counter arrival hall mein baggage claim area ke qareeb waqe hai jahan international passengers apna foreign currency Pakistani Rupees mein convert kar sakte hain. Departure terminal mein bhi currency exchange services hain security checkpoint se pehle aur baad mein dono jagah. Yeh counters aam tor par subah 6 bajay se raat 11 bajay tak khulay rehtay hain, lekin timings flight schedules ke mutabiq badal sakti hain. Exchange rates market rates ke qareeb hote hain lekin thoda commission charge kiya jata hai. Commonly exchanged currencies mein shamil hain: US Dollar, Euro, British Pound, Saudi Riyal, UAE Dirham, aur doosri major currencies. Exchange karte waqt apna passport lana na bhoolein kyunki identification zaruri hai khas tor par bara amounts ke liye. Rates ka comparison karne ke liye, aap exchange counter par pehle rates pooch sakte hain aur decision le sakte hain. Pakistani Rupees ko foreign currency mein wapas badalna bhi mumkin hai, lekin is ke liye original exchange receipt zaruri ho sakti hai.

query: Airport lounge mein kaise ja sakte hain?
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport mein premium lounges tak rasai hasil karne ke kai tariqay hain. Gate 7 ke qareeb waqe main lounge entry ke liye yeh options hain: Business ya First Class ticket holders automatically qualified hain airport lounges ke liye, frequent flyer program ke elite members jo qualifying status rakhte hain free access hasil kar sakte hain, Priority Pass membership holders apna card dikha kar enter ho sakte hain, aur day passes airport par hi purchase kiye ja sakte hain agar seats available hon. Day pass ka kharcha aam tor par PKR 3,000-5,000 ke darmiyan hota hai per person. Lounge facilities mein yeh shamil hain: complimentary food aur beverages including hot meals, snacks, tea, coffee, aur soft drinks, comfortable seating arrangements, free high-speed WiFi, business center with computers aur printing facilities, shower facilities, TV aur entertainment options, aur newspapers aur magazines. Lounge mein reh kar aap ek shanti aur aram deh mahol mein apne flight ka intezar kar sakte hain door from the crowded terminal. Kuch credit cards bhi lounge access provide karte hain, to apne card benefits check karein.

query: Kya mobile phone charging stations hain?
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein multiple mobile phone charging stations aur facilities available hain poore terminal mein. Free charging stations kai locations par installed hain including: gate seating areas mein jahan dedicated charging kiosks hain multiple USB ports aur power outlets ke saath, food court area mein jahan tables ke qareeb outlets hain, waiting lounges mein, aur main departure hall mein. Kai modern seating areas mein built-in USB ports aur power sockets directly chairs mein hi embedded hain, jo convenient charging ko bahut asaan banate hain. Premium lounges mein wireless charging pads aur zyada charging stations available hain. Agar aap ko charging cable chahiye, kuch convenience stores airport mein charging cables aur portable power banks bhi frokhaat karte hain. Meherbani kar ke dhyan rakhein ke apne devices ko charging stations par unattended na chhodein kyunki theft ho sakti hai. Apne phone par nazar rakhein ya usse pocket mein rakhen jab charge ho raha ho. Agar sabhi charging stations busy hain, to aap restaurants ya cafes mein bhi outlets use kar sakte hain apne khane ke sath.

query: Airport mein ATM machine kahan hai?
expected_response: ATM machines Islamabad International Airport mein kai locations par available hain convenience ke liye. Aap ko ATMs milenge: main entrance ke qareeb arrival aur departure areas mein, food court ke vicinity mein jahan log shopping ya khana khaate waqt cash ki zaroorat mehsoos karte hain, aur central departure hall mein security checkpoint se pehle. Yeh ATMs Pakistan ke major banks dwara operate kiye jate hain jaise Habib Bank Limited (HBL), National Bank of Pakistan, MCB, aur Allied Bank. ATMs se aap: Pakistani Rupees withdraw kar sakte hain, account balance check kar sakte hain, aur basic banking transactions perform kar sakte hain. Domestic cards ke liye, yeh services aam tor par free ya minimal fee ke sath hain. International card holders (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Union Pay) bhi in ATMs se withdrawal kar sakte hain, lekin foreign transaction fees apply ho sakti hain jo aap ke home bank dwara charge ki jati hain. Withdrawal limits typically PKR 25,000-50,000 per transaction hain, jo aap ke bank aur card type par depend karta hai. Security ke liye, ATMs CCTV surveillance ke nichay hain aur 24/7 available hain.

query: Kya wheelchair service available hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, bilkul! Wheelchair service Islamabad International Airport par free of charge available hai tamam passengers ke liye jo mobility assistance chahte hain. Yeh service available hai for: elderly passengers, disabled travelers, passengers with temporary injuries, aur koi bhi jo walking mein difficulty mehsoos karta ho. Wheelchair request karne ke liye: advance mein apni airline ko inform karein booking ke waqt ya kam az kam 48 ghantay flight se pehle, ya arrival par airport ke information desk par request karein jo immediately arrange kar dein ge. Trained staff members wheelchair push karte hain aur passengers ko: entry se check-in counter tak, security screening tak, boarding gate tak, aur zaroorat parne par aircraft door tak assist karte hain. Service arrival par bhi available hai aircraft se baggage claim aur exit tak. Additional assistance jaise ke boarding/de-boarding ke liye special equipment bhi request ki ja sakti hai agar severe mobility issues hain. Yeh tamam services free hain, lekin agar aap chahain to staff member ko tip de sakte hain appreciation ke tor par. Service high season ya busy times mein thodi delay ho sakti hai, isliye advance request ki tavsiya di jati hai.

query: Airport mein first aid ya medical facility kahan hai?
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport mein comprehensive medical center Gate 2 ke qareeb waqe hai jo 24/7 khula rehta hai. Yeh fully equipped medical facility emergency situations aur routine medical needs dono ko handle karti hai. Medical center mein available services: qualified doctors aur paramedics jo immediate medical attention provide karte hain, basic medical equipment jaise blood pressure monitors, thermometers, aur first aid supplies, emergency medications ka stock, minor injury treatment jaise cuts, bruises, sprains, illness evaluation aur initial treatment, aur ambulance services ka immediate contact serious emergencies ke liye. Common situations jahan passengers medical center ka rujoo karte hain: travel sickness, headaches ya fever, blood pressure issues, diabetic emergencies, minor accidents ya falls, allergic reactions, aur anxiety ya panic attacks. Medical staff multilingual hai aur Urdu, English, aur kuch regional languages bol sakta hai. Service basic consultation ke liye aam tor par free hai, lekin medications ya specialized treatment ke liye charge ho sakta hai. Agar aap ko chronic medical condition hai aur regular medications lete hain, to apni medicines carry through karna na bhoolein with proper prescriptions. Airport security aur information desk staff basic first aid mein bhi trained hain aur immediate help provide kar sakte hain medical center tak pahunchne tak.

query: Kya bachon ke liye play area hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated kids play area hai jo Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hai specifically 2-10 saal ke bachon ke liye designed. Yeh bright aur colorful play zone safe aur entertaining environment provide karta hai families ke liye jo apni flight ka intezar kar rahe hain. Play area mein included hain: climbing structures jo age-appropriate aur safe hain, slides aur tunnels exploration ke liye, interactive games aur activities jo cognitive development ko promote karti hain, soft play equipment chhote bachon ke liye, aur seating area parents ke liye jahan wo apne bachon par nazar rakh sakte hain. Safety features include: padded flooring cushioning falls ke liye, rounded edges tamam equipment par, regular cleaning aur sanitization, aur security staff ki presence area ke qareeb. Play area usually 6 AM se 10 PM tak khula rehta hai, lekin hours vary kar sakte hain. Area mein entry free hai aur no reservation required. Parents ya guardians ka supervision zaruri hai bachon ke sath. Busy times par, especially weekends ya holidays par, area crowded ho sakta hai to off-peak hours mein jana better experience de sakta hai. Adjacent area mein benches aur charging points bhi hain parents ke liye. Agar aap ka bacha restless ho raha hai long wait ke doran, yeh play area perfect solution hai unhe entertain karne ka.

query: Restroom facilities kahan hain?
expected_response: Restrooms (washrooms/toilets) Islamabad International Airport ke poore terminal mein conveniently located hain aur clearly marked signage ke sath. Aap ko restrooms milenge: har gate area ke qareeb takay passengers jaldi access kar sakein, food court aur dining areas ke vicinity mein, main departure aur arrival halls mein, aur security checkpoint se pehle aur baad mein. Facilities include: separate men's aur women's restrooms, family restrooms jo spacious hain aur parents ko chhote bachon ke sath accommodate karte hain baby changing stations ke sath, accessible restrooms specially designed for disabled passengers with wheelchair-friendly stalls, prayer/ablution facilities kuch washrooms mein Muslim passengers ke liye, aur regular cleaning aur maintenance jo hygiene ensure karta hai. Restrooms mein available amenities: flush toilets (mostly western style, kuch squat toilets bhi), wash basins with running water, soap dispensers, hand dryers ya paper towels, aur mirrors. Peak hours mein restrooms busy ho sakte hain, to agar time hai to less crowded areas mein washrooms try karein. Agar koi maintenance issue hai ya cleanliness concern, to nearest information desk ya staff member ko inform karein. Signage follow karein jo restrooms ki direction indicate karta hai - usually male symbol for men, female symbol for women, aur wheelchair symbol for accessible facilities.

query: Kya airport mein baby changing station hai?
expected_response: Ji haan bilkul, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated baby changing facilities available hain families ke liye. Gate 3 ke qareeb specially designed mother and baby room hai jo private aur comfortable space provide karta hai. Is room mein included hain: clean aur hygienic changing tables jo safe height par installed hain, disposable changing mats jo agar available hon, diaper disposal bins, wash basin with warm water, aur comfortable seating area for nursing mothers. Additionally, family restrooms poore terminal mein available hain jo bhi changing tables equipped hain. Yeh family washrooms extra spacious hain takay parents strollers ya wheelchairs ke sath easily maneuver kar sakein. Baby changing facilities mein basic amenities hain lekin apni own diapers, wipes, aur baby care products lana recommended hai kyunki airport mein yeh consistently available nahi ho sakte. Kuch convenience stores aur pharmacies terminal mein emergency baby supplies bechte hain agar zaroorat parre. Staff members bhi helpful hain aur agar aap ko baby facilities dhoondhne mein help chahiye to information desk se guide kar sakta hai. Mother and baby room mein nursing area bhi hai complete privacy ke liye. Room clean aur well-maintained hai aur regular monitoring hoti hai hygiene ensure karne ke liye.

query: Airport par lost and found office kahan hai?
expected_response: Lost and Found office Islamabad International Airport mein main departure hall ke ground floor par waqe hai, usually information desk ke qareeb. Agar aap ne koi item khoya hai airport mein ya aap ko kisi ki chhuti hui cheez mili hai, yeh office aap ki madad kar sakta hai. Services include: khoyi hui items ko report karna aur database mein register karana, found items ko claim karna proper identification ke sath, temporary storage for lost items for a certain period (usually 30-90 days), aur coordination with airlines for items left on aircraft. Common lost items include: mobile phones, wallets, passports, laptops, bags, jewelry, aur personal documents. Agar aap ne airport mein kuch khoya hai: immediately Lost and Found office ko inform karein with detailed description, item ki purchase receipt ya unique features batayein jo ownership prove karein, contact information de dein takay office aap ko inform kar sake agar item mil jaye, aur regular follow-up karein. Items claim karte waqt valid identification zaruri hai. Agar item valuable hai jaise passport ya travel documents, to immigration aur airline ko bhi inform karein. Lost and Found office ke working hours typically 8 AM se 8 PM tak hain, lekin emergency situations mein airport security bhi assist kar sakta hai. Phone contact bhi available hai inquiries ke liye. Unclaimed items ek specific period ke baad auction ya charity ko donate kar di jati hain.

query: Kya smoking area airport mein hai?
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport ka poora indoor terminal completely smoke-free hai Pakistani law aur aviation regulations ke mutabiq. Cigarette smoking, e-cigarettes, aur vaping devices terminal ke andar strictly prohibited hain. Sirf ek designated smoking area hai jo terminal ke bahar outdoor space mein waqe hai, jo security checkpoint ke baad accessible hai. Yeh outdoor smoking zone clearly marked hai with signage aur specific location par accessible hai. Smoking area mein basic facilities jaise ashtrays aur sitting arrangement ho sakte hain. Important points: agar aap smoking area jana chahte hain security ke baad, to aap ko dobara security screening se guzarna pare ga agar aap wapas terminal mein aana chahte hain, to time accordingly plan karein especially agar flight jaldi hai, tobacco products duty-free shops se purchase kiye ja sakte hain lekin unhe international flights par le jana restrictions ke sath ho sakta hai, aur terminal ke andar smoking ke serious consequences hain including heavy fines aur potential legal action. Agar aap smoker hain, to flight se pehle smoking area use karne ka plan banayein aur apne boarding time ka dhyan rakhein. Nicotine patches ya gum bhi available hain pharmacy se jo long flights ke doran madad kar sakte hain. Airport staff smoking rules ko strictly enforce karta hai passenger aur staff safety ke liye.

query: Information desk kahan milegi?
expected_response: Information desks Islamabad International Airport mein multiple strategic locations par available hain takay passengers easily help access kar sakein. Main information desk central departure hall mein waqe hai jahan easily visible signage hai. Additional information points hain: arrival hall mein international passengers ke liye, security checkpoint ke qareeb, aur some gate areas mein. Information desk staff multilingual hai aur English, Urdu, aur regional languages mein communicate kar sakta hai. Services provided include: general airport information jaise terminal layout, gate locations, facility directions, flight information aur updates about delays, cancellations, ya gate changes, lost and found assistance, wheelchair aur special assistance requests, directions to restaurants, shops, lounges, aur other facilities, local transportation information jaise taxis, buses, aur car rentals, hotel recommendations aur booking assistance, tourist information about Islamabad aur Pakistan, aur emergency assistance aur coordination with security ya medical services. Staff trained hai handle karne ko various passenger inquiries aur typically friendly aur helpful hai. Agar aap ko kisi bhi facility ya service ke baare mein confusion hai, information desk first point of contact hai. Desk hours usually early morning se late night tak hain flight schedules ke sath align ho kar. Busy times par wait time ho sakta hai, lekin staff quickly assist karne ki koshish karta hai. Free brochures, maps, aur pamphlets bhi information desk par available hain.

query: Kya airport mein pharmacy hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, pharmacy ya medical store Islamabad International Airport ke departure terminal mein available hai jo basic medications aur health products bechti hai. Pharmacy typically Gate 4 ke qareeb location par hai aur convenient hours mein khuli rehti hai usually subah 7 bajay se raat 10 bajay tak, lekin exact timings vary kar sakti hain. Available products mein shamil hain: over-the-counter medications jaise pain relievers (paracetamol, ibuprofen), cold aur flu medicines, antacids for stomach issues, anti-diarrhea medicines, allergy medications (antihistamines), motion sickness tablets, first aid supplies jaise bandages, antiseptic creams, thermometers, basic health monitoring devices jaise BP monitors, personal care items aur hygiene products, vitamins aur supplements, aur limited baby care products jaise formula milk, diapers. Prescription medications limited selection mein available ho sakte hain, lekin better hai ke apni own prescribed medicines carry karein especially chronic conditions ke liye. Pharmacist basic health advice bhi de sakta hai aur suitable over-the-counter options recommend kar sakta hai. Prices airport pharmacy mein city pharmacies se thode zyada ho sakte hain. Agar aap ko specific medication chahiye jo wahan nahi hai, pharmacist alternative suggest kar sakta hai. Travel health essentials jaise jet lag pills, sleep aids, aur digestive enzymes bhi mil sakte hain. Emergency medical situations ke liye, medical center Gate 2 par better option hai jahan doctors available hain.

query: Airport lounge mein kya kya facilities hain?
expected_response: Premium lounge Islamabad International Airport mein comprehensive facilities provide karta hai comfortable aur relaxing experience ke liye. Gate 7 ke qareeb waqe lounge mein yeh amenities included hain: Food aur Beverages - complimentary buffet with hot meals (Pakistani aur international cuisine), variety of snacks jaise samosas, sandwiches, fruits, bakery items, unlimited beverages including tea, coffee, juices, soft drinks, aur kuch lounges mein limited alcoholic beverages bhi; Seating aur Comfort - comfortable recliners aur sofas, quiet zones for rest, individual workstations for business travelers; Technology - free high-speed WiFi throughout lounge, charging stations with multiple ports, business center with computers, printers, photocopiers, aur scanners, international newspapers aur magazines, TV screens with news aur entertainment channels; Washroom Facilities - clean aur well-maintained restrooms, shower facilities with towels aur toiletries, personal grooming products; Additional Services - flight information displays, assistance with rebooking ya inquiries, limited meeting rooms (availability par dependent), aur concierge services. Lounge environment peaceful hai away from crowded terminal. Air conditioning ya heating maintained hai for optimal comfort. Staff attentive hai aur regularly replenish food aur drinks. Some lounges mein spa ya massage chairs bhi ho sakte hain. Access usually 3-4 hours se pehle ki flight ke liye allowed hai. Guest policies vary - kuch lounges allow karte hain additional guests for a fee.

query: Kya duty free shopping available hai?
expected_response: Ji haan bilkul! Duty-free shopping Islamabad International Airport mein international departure area mein available hai security checkpoint ke baad. Duty-free shop mein wide range of products hai discounted prices par kyunki taxes aur duties waived hain international travelers ke liye. Available categories: Perfumes aur Cosmetics - international brands jaise Chanel, Dior, Estee Lauder, MAC, luxury fragrances aur skincare products; Alcohol aur Tobacco - imported wines, spirits, champagne, cigarettes, cigars (restrictions apply based on destination country); Electronics - headphones, cameras, watches, gadgets; Fashion Accessories - branded sunglasses, bags, wallets, scarves; Chocolates aur Confectionery - international brands jaise Toblerone, Lindt, Ferrero Rocher, gift boxes; Local Products - Pakistani handicrafts, traditional items, souvenirs. Shopping karte waqt remember karein: duty-free only international passengers ke liye hai proper boarding pass ke sath, liquid restrictions apply if purchased before security (lekin duty-free se baad mein no problem), destination country ki customs limits check karein especially alcohol aur tobacco ke liye, prices compare karein kyunki kabhi kabhi airport duty-free bhi expensive ho sakta hai regular stores se, aur payment methods include cash (PKR aur major foreign currencies) aur credit/debit cards. Staff multilingual hai aur assist kar sakti hai. Products typically sealed bags mein di jati hain jo flight tak nahi kholni chahiye. Purchase receipts save karein customs declaration ke liye.

query: Kahan se airport ka map mil sakta hai?
expected_response: Airport map ya terminal layout Islamabad International Airport ka kai ways se mil sakta hai: Information Desk - free printed maps available hain jo detailed terminal layout dikhate hain with all facilities marked, yeh maps usually Urdu aur English dono mein hain. Digital Displays - interactive touchscreen kiosks poore terminal mein installed hain jo digital map provide karte hain 'You Are Here' marker ke sath, yeh kiosks allow karte hain ke aap specific facilities search karein aur directions paye. Mobile App - agar airport ka official mobile app hai to download kar ke detailed map aur real-time navigation mil sakti hai. Website - airport ki official website par downloadable PDF maps available hain jo aap print kar sakte hain travel se pehle. Signage - comprehensive directional signage poore terminal mein hai jo major facilities ki taraf guide karta hai including gates, restrooms, food court, lounges. Map features jo typically included hain: gate numbers aur locations, check-in counters, security checkpoints, baggage claim areas, restrooms, prayer rooms, medical center, information desks, restaurants aur cafes, shops aur duty-free, ATMs aur currency exchange, taxi stands aur transportation, parking areas. Maps mein usually color coding hoti hai different zones ke liye aur symbols standardized hote hain. Agar printed map chahiye, to information desk se free copy request karein. Staff bhi verbally directions de sakta hai agar map confusing lag raha ho.

query: Kya airport mein hotel hai ya nearby?
expected_response: Direct airport ke andar hotel nahi hai, lekin Islamabad International Airport ke bahut qareeb multiple hotel options available hain different budget ranges mein. Airport ke vicinity mein hotels: Airport Hotels (walking distance within 5-10 minutes) - usually 3-4 star category with shuttle service, facilities include comfortable rooms, restaurants, WiFi, gym; Mid-range Hotels (2-5 km radius) - affordable options with basic amenities, airport pickup/drop service available; Luxury Hotels (Islamabad city mein, 20-30 km) - 5-star properties with full services agar aap extended stay chahte hain. Hotel booking: advance online booking through websites like Booking.com, Hotels.com, ya direct hotel websites recommended hai, information desk airport par hotel recommendations aur booking assistance provide kar sakta hai, kuch hotels mein airport desk bhi hota hai arrival area mein, taxi drivers bhi hotel suggestions de sakte hain lekin confirm karein ke wo commission base recommendations nahi hain. Hotel amenities typically: free airport shuttle (confirm timing advance mein), 24-hour check-in for late night arrivals, luggage storage agar early check-out ya late flight hai, dining options, meeting rooms for business travelers. Layover passengers: agar aap ka long layover hai (6+ hours), to day-use rooms kuch hotels mein available hain without overnight stay. Prices vary PKR 5,000 se lekar 20,000+ per night tak depending on hotel category aur season. Transit hotels specifically designed for short stays zyada convenient hain.

query: Food court mein kya options hain?
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport ka food court diverse dining options provide karta hai local aur international cuisine ke sath. Food court central location par hai easily accessible sabhi passengers ko. Available dining options: International Fast Food Chains - KFC for fried chicken, Subway for sandwiches aur subs, McDonald's (agar available ho), Pizza Hut for pizzas aur Italian items; Local Pakistani Restaurants - Taste of Pakistan jo authentic Pakistani dishes serve karta hai jaise biryani, karahi, nihari, haleem, various kebabs, traditional breakfast items like paratha aur chanay; Cafes aur Bakeries - Dunkin Donuts, local bakeries with fresh bread, cakes, pastries, cookies; Quick Service - snack bars with samosas, sandwiches, burgers, wraps; Beverages - tea stalls with desi chai, coffee shops, juice bars with fresh fruit juices aur smoothies. Dining considerations: prices airport mein city restaurants se slightly higher hain, operating hours vary but most places open early morning to late night, seating area shared hai with tables aur chairs, payment methods include cash aur cards mostly, halal food standards maintained hain as per Islamic requirements, vegetarian options bhi available hain though limited compared to non-veg. Popular items: for quick bite - samosa, sandwich, burger; for full meal - biryani plate, chicken karahi with naan; for breakfast - paratha with chanay, omelette; for snacks - pakora, french fries, pizza slice; for beverages - chai, coffee, fresh juice. Family dining areas with high chairs for babies bhi available hain. Takeaway bhi possible hai agar aap apne gate par le jana chahte hain. Nutritional information limited hai lekin staff se ingredients ke baare mein pooch sakte hain.

query: Kya airport mein barber shop ya salon hai?
expected_response: Limited grooming services Islamabad International Airport mein available hain. Premium lounge mein basic grooming facilities ho sakti hain like shaving kits, combs, aur mirrors, lekin dedicated full-service barber shop ya beauty salon typically airport terminal mein nahi hai. Alternative options: nearby airport hotels mein salon services available ho sakti hain jo passengers ko accommodate kar sakte hain appointment ke sath, city mein proper salons aur barber shops 20-30 minutes drive par available hain extensive services ke liye, premium lounge mein limited grooming amenities jaise razors, shaving cream, aftershave, hair combs available hain self-service ke liye, pharmacy aur convenience stores personal grooming products bechte hain jaise combs, hair gel, deodorant jo aap quickly use kar sakte hain restroom mein. Typical grooming needs ke liye: clean shave - men's restroom mein aap apna own razor use kar sakte hain, hair fixing - comb aur hair products pharmacy se available hain, makeup - ladies restroom mein proper lighting aur mirrors hain, nail care - limited manicure kits convenience stores mein. Long layovers aur early morning flights ke liye yeh facilities helpful ho sakti hain freshen up karne ke liye. Future mein agar airport expand hota hai to dedicated salon service add ho sakti hai jaise kuch international airports mein hoti hai.

query: Baggage wrapping service kahan hai?
expected_response: Baggage wrapping aur packing services Islamabad International Airport mein check-in counters ke qareeb available hain departure terminal mein. Yeh service aap ki luggage ko protective plastic wrapping mein wrap karti hai additional security aur protection ke liye. Baggage wrapping benefits: protection against scratches, dirt, aur weather damage during handling, tamper deterrent jo unauthorized opening ko prevent karta hai aur aap ko peace of mind deta hai, easier identification kyunki wrapped bags stand out on baggage carousel, leakage prevention agar aap liquids ya fragile items pack kiye hain. Service process: aap apna bag wrapping station par le jayein, staff proper size ki plastic wrap use karega aur machine se tightly wrap karega covering all sides, handles aur wheels usually exposed rahte hain easy handling ke liye, price based on bag size - typically PKR 200-500 per bag, payment cash ya card se kar sakte hain, process quick hai usually 5-10 minutes per bag. When to use: international travel especially to countries jahan baggage handling rough hai, expensive luggage ko protect karne ke liye, bags with multiple pockets jo easily open ho sakte hain, gifts ya fragile items jo extra protection chahte hain. Important: wrapping ke baad agar security random check select karti hai to aap ko wrapping open karni par sakti hai for inspection aur phir rewrap karwani hogi. Wrapping karane se pehle ensure karein ke aap ki baggage properly packed hai aur locked hai. Alternative: aap apna own plastic wrap bhi la sakte hain aur DIY kar sakte hain lekin airport service zyada professional aur secure hai.

query: Kya airport mein porter service available hai?
expected_response: Ji haan, porter services Islamabad International Airport mein available hain jo aap ki heavy luggage carry karne mein madad karte hain. Porters licensed aur uniformed hote hain aur airport ke entrance, arrival area, aur check-in counters ke qareeb readily available hain. Porter assistance useful hai when: aap ke paas multiple heavy bags hain, aap elderly hain ya physical limitations hain, aap children ke sath travel kar rahe hain aur hands full hain, aap time-sensitive situation mein hain aur quickly move karna chahte hain. Porter services include: baggage trolley arrange karna, bags ko entry se check-in counter tak le jana, check-in process mein assistance, check-in se security ya gate tak bags carry karna arrival par, bags ko aircraft se baggage claim tak track karna aur collect karna, baggage claim se taxi stand ya pickup point tak transport. query: Mera flight delay ho gaya, kya facilities hain?

query: Passport lost ho gaya airport par, kya karun?

Report to Authorities - immediately Lost and Found office ko report karein with detailed description, report to Airport Security office with your details, agar aap Pakistani citizen hain to nearest police post par FIR register karwayein. Contact Your Embassy/Consulate - agar aap foreign national hain, apne country ki embassy ya consulate Islamabad mein contact karein immediately, wo emergency travel document issue kar sakte hain, embassy contact numbers information desk se mil sakti hain ya online available hain. For Pakistani Citizens - NADRA office ya designated counter airport par ja sakti hai (availability confirm karein), emergency passport issuance possible hai but time-consuming ho sakta hai, original CNIC aur flight booking evidence helpful hoga. Airline Coordination - apni airline ko situation explain karein, wo possibly flight reschedule kar sakti hai agar documents ke liye time chahiye, some flexibility possible hai emergencies mein lekin charges apply ho sakte hain. Required Information to Report - your full name, passport number (agar yaad hai ya copy hai), issue aur expiry date, photo agar available ho, last location where you had it, description of passport cover agar distinctive hai. Preventive Measures Future Ke Liye - always keep photocopy of passport separately, save scanned copy in email/cloud, use passport holder with secure attachment, keep passport in front pocket or secure bag, immediately report if lost. Airport staff aur security helpful hain such situations mein, don't panic aur systematically address the issue.

query: Airport se city center tak taxi ka fare kitna hai?

Gate 7 ke qareeb waqe main lounge entry ke liye yeh options hain: Business ya First Class ticket holders automatically qualified hain airport lounges ke liye, frequent flyer program ke elite members jo qualifying status rakhte hain free access hasil kar sakte hain, Priority Pass membership holders apna card dikha kar enter ho sakte hain, aur day passes airport par hi purchase kiye ja sakte hain agar seats available hon. Day pass ka kharcha aam tor par PKR 3,000-5,000 ke darmiyan hota hai per person. Lounge facilities mein yeh shamil hain: complimentary food aur beverages including hot meals, snacks, tea, coffee, aur soft drinks, comfortable seating arrangements, free high-speed WiFi, business center with computers aur printing facilities, shower facilities, TV aur entertainment options, aur newspapers aur magazines. Lounge mein reh kar aap ek shanti aur aram deh mahol mein apne flight ka intezar kar sakte hain door from the crowded terminal. Kuch credit cards bhi lounge access provide karte hain, to apne card benefits check karein.

query: Kya mobile phone charging stations hain? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein multiple mobile phone charging stations aur facilities available hain poore terminal mein. Free charging stations kai locations par installed hain including: gate seating areas mein jahan dedicated charging kiosks hain multiple USB ports aur power outlets ke saath, food court area mein jahan tables ke qareeb outlets hain, waiting lounges mein, aur main departure hall mein. Kai modern seating areas mein built-in USB ports aur power sockets directly chairs mein hi embedded hain, jo convenient charging ko bahut asaan banate hain. Premium lounges mein wireless charging pads aur zyada charging stations available hain. Agar aap ko charging cable chahiye, kuch convenience stores airport mein charging cables aur portable power banks bhi frokhaat karte hain. Meherbani kar ke dhyan rakhein ke apne devices ko charging stations par unattended na chhodein kyunki theft ho sakti hai. Apne phone par nazar rakhein ya usse pocket mein rakhen jab charge ho raha ho. Agar sabhi charging stations busy hain, to aap restaurants ya cafes mein bhi outlets use kar sakte hain apne khane ke sath.

query: Airport mein ATM machine kahan hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: ATM machines Islamabad International Airport mein kai locations par available hain convenience ke liye. Aap ko ATMs milenge: main entrance ke qareeb arrival aur departure areas mein, food court ke vicinity mein jahan log shopping ya khana khaate waqt cash ki zaroorat mehsoos karte hain, aur central departure hall mein security checkpoint se pehle. Yeh ATMs Pakistan ke major banks dwara operate kiye jate hain jaise Habib Bank Limited (HBL), National Bank of Pakistan, MCB, aur Allied Bank. ATMs se aap: Pakistani Rupees withdraw kar sakte hain, account balance check kar sakte hain, aur basic banking transactions perform kar sakte hain. Domestic cards ke liye, yeh services aam tor par free ya minimal fee ke sath hain. International card holders (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Union Pay) bhi in ATMs se withdrawal kar sakte hain, lekin foreign transaction fees apply ho sakti hain jo aap ke home bank dwara charge ki jati hain. Withdrawal limits typically PKR 25,000-50,000 per transaction hain, jo aap ke bank aur card type par depend karta hai. Security ke liye, ATMs CCTV surveillance ke nichay hain aur 24/7 available hain.

query: Kya wheelchair service available hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan, bilkul! Wheelchair service Islamabad International Airport par free of charge available hai tamam passengers ke liye jo mobility assistance chahte hain. Yeh service available hai for: elderly passengers, disabled travelers, passengers with temporary injuries, aur koi bhi jo walking mein difficulty mehsoos karta ho. Wheelchair request karne ke liye: advance mein apni airline ko inform karein booking ke waqt ya kam az kam 48 ghantay flight se pehle, ya arrival par airport ke information desk par request karein jo immediately arrange kar dein ge. Trained staff members wheelchair push karte hain aur passengers ko: entry se check-in counter tak, security screening tak, boarding gate tak, aur zaroorat parne par aircraft door tak assist karte hain. Service arrival par bhi available hai aircraft se baggage claim aur exit tak. Additional assistance jaise ke boarding/de-boarding ke liye special equipment bhi request ki ja sakti hai agar severe mobility issues hain. Yeh tamam services free hain, lekin agar aap chahain to staff member ko tip de sakte hain appreciation ke tor par. Service high season ya busy times mein thodi delay ho sakti hai, isliye advance request ki tavsiya di jati hai.

query: Airport mein first aid ya medical facility kahan hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport mein comprehensive medical center Gate 2 ke qareeb waqe hai jo 24/7 khula rehta hai. Yeh fully equipped medical facility emergency situations aur routine medical needs dono ko handle karti hai. Medical center mein available services: qualified doctors aur paramedics jo immediate medical attention provide karte hain, basic medical equipment jaise blood pressure monitors, thermometers, aur first aid supplies, emergency medications ka stock, minor injury treatment jaise cuts, bruises, sprains, illness evaluation aur initial treatment, aur ambulance services ka immediate contact serious emergencies ke liye. Common situations jahan passengers medical center ka rujoo karte hain: travel sickness, headaches ya fever, blood pressure issues, diabetic emergencies, minor accidents ya falls, allergic reactions, aur anxiety ya panic attacks. Medical staff multilingual hai aur Urdu, English, aur kuch regional languages bol sakta hai. Service basic consultation ke liye aam tor par free hai, lekin medications ya specialized treatment ke liye charge ho sakta hai. Agar aap ko chronic medical condition hai aur regular medications lete hain, to apni medicines carry through karna na bhoolein with proper prescriptions. Airport security aur information desk staff basic first aid mein bhi trained hain aur immediate help provide kar sakte hain medical center tak pahunchne tak.

query: Kya bachon ke liye play area hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated kids play area hai jo Gate 5 ke qareeb waqe hai specifically 2-10 saal ke bachon ke liye designed. Yeh bright aur colorful play zone safe aur entertaining environment provide karta hai families ke liye jo apni flight ka intezar kar rahe hain. Play area mein included hain: climbing structures jo age-appropriate aur safe hain, slides aur tunnels exploration ke liye, interactive games aur activities jo cognitive development ko promote karti hain, soft play equipment chhote bachon ke liye, aur seating area parents ke liye jahan wo apne bachon par nazar rakh sakte hain. Safety features include: padded flooring cushioning falls ke liye, rounded edges tamam equipment par, regular cleaning aur sanitization, aur security staff ki presence area ke qareeb. Play area usually 6 AM se 10 PM tak khula rehta hai, lekin hours vary kar sakte hain. Area mein entry free hai aur no reservation required. Parents ya guardians ka supervision zaruri hai bachon ke sath. Busy times par, especially weekends ya holidays par, area crowded ho sakta hai to off-peak hours mein jana better experience de sakta hai. Adjacent area mein benches aur charging points bhi hain parents ke liye. Agar aap ka bacha restless ho raha hai long wait ke doran, yeh play area perfect solution hai unhe entertain karne ka.

query: Restroom facilities kahan hain? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Restrooms (washrooms/toilets) Islamabad International Airport ke poore terminal mein conveniently located hain aur clearly marked signage ke sath. Aap ko restrooms milenge: har gate area ke qareeb takay passengers jaldi access kar sakein, food court aur dining areas ke vicinity mein, main departure aur arrival halls mein, aur security checkpoint se pehle aur baad mein. Facilities include: separate men's aur women's restrooms, family restrooms jo spacious hain aur parents ko chhote bachon ke sath accommodate karte hain baby changing stations ke sath, accessible restrooms specially designed for disabled passengers with wheelchair-friendly stalls, prayer/ablution facilities kuch washrooms mein Muslim passengers ke liye, aur regular cleaning aur maintenance jo hygiene ensure karta hai. Restrooms mein available amenities: flush toilets (mostly western style, kuch squat toilets bhi), wash basins with running water, soap dispensers, hand dryers ya paper towels, aur mirrors. Peak hours mein restrooms busy ho sakte hain, to agar time hai to less crowded areas mein washrooms try karein. Agar koi maintenance issue hai ya cleanliness concern, to nearest information desk ya staff member ko inform karein. Signage follow karein jo restrooms ki direction indicate karta hai - usually male symbol for men, female symbol for women, aur wheelchair symbol for accessible facilities.

query: Kya airport mein baby changing station hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan bilkul, Islamabad International Airport mein dedicated baby changing facilities available hain families ke liye. Gate 3 ke qareeb specially designed mother and baby room hai jo private aur comfortable space provide karta hai. Is room mein included hain: clean aur hygienic changing tables jo safe height par installed hain, disposable changing mats jo agar available hon, diaper disposal bins, wash basin with warm water, aur comfortable seating area for nursing mothers. Additionally, family restrooms poore terminal mein available hain jo bhi changing tables equipped hain. Yeh family washrooms extra spacious hain takay parents strollers ya wheelchairs ke sath easily maneuver kar sakein. Baby changing facilities mein basic amenities hain lekin apni own diapers, wipes, aur baby care products lana recommended hai kyunki airport mein yeh consistently available nahi ho sakte. Kuch convenience stores aur pharmacies terminal mein emergency baby supplies bechte hain agar zaroorat parre. Staff members bhi helpful hain aur agar aap ko baby facilities dhoondhne mein help chahiye to information desk se guide kar sakta hai. Mother and baby room mein nursing area bhi hai complete privacy ke liye. Room clean aur well-maintained hai aur regular monitoring hoti hai hygiene ensure karne ke liye.

query: Airport par lost and found office kahan hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Lost and Found office Islamabad International Airport mein main departure hall ke ground floor par waqe hai, usually information desk ke qareeb. Agar aap ne koi item khoya hai airport mein ya aap ko kisi ki chhuti hui cheez mili hai, yeh office aap ki madad kar sakta hai. Services include: khoyi hui items ko report karna aur database mein register karana, found items ko claim karna proper identification ke sath, temporary storage for lost items for a certain period (usually 30-90 days), aur coordination with airlines for items left on aircraft. Common lost items include: mobile phones, wallets, passports, laptops, bags, jewelry, aur personal documents. Agar aap ne airport mein kuch khoya hai: immediately Lost and Found office ko inform karein with detailed description, item ki purchase receipt ya unique features batayein jo ownership prove karein, contact information de dein takay office aap ko inform kar sake agar item mil jaye, aur regular follow-up karein. Items claim karte waqt valid identification zaruri hai. Agar item valuable hai jaise passport ya travel documents, to immigration aur airline ko bhi inform karein. Lost and Found office ke working hours typically 8 AM se 8 PM tak hain, lekin emergency situations mein airport security bhi assist kar sakta hai. Phone contact bhi available hai inquiries ke liye. Unclaimed items ek specific period ke baad auction ya charity ko donate kar di jati hain.

query: Kya smoking area airport mein hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport ka poora indoor terminal completely smoke-free hai Pakistani law aur aviation regulations ke mutabiq. Cigarette smoking, e-cigarettes, aur vaping devices terminal ke andar strictly prohibited hain. Sirf ek designated smoking area hai jo terminal ke bahar outdoor space mein waqe hai, jo security checkpoint ke baad accessible hai. Yeh outdoor smoking zone clearly marked hai with signage aur specific location par accessible hai. Smoking area mein basic facilities jaise ashtrays aur sitting arrangement ho sakte hain. Important points: agar aap smoking area jana chahte hain security ke baad, to aap ko dobara security screening se guzarna pare ga agar aap wapas terminal mein aana chahte hain, to time accordingly plan karein especially agar flight jaldi hai, tobacco products duty-free shops se purchase kiye ja sakte hain lekin unhe international flights par le jana restrictions ke sath ho sakta hai, aur terminal ke andar smoking ke serious consequences hain including heavy fines aur potential legal action. Agar aap smoker hain, to flight se pehle smoking area use karne ka plan banayein aur apne boarding time ka dhyan rakhein. Nicotine patches ya gum bhi available hain pharmacy se jo long flights ke doran madad kar sakte hain. Airport staff smoking rules ko strictly enforce karta hai passenger aur staff safety ke liye.

query: Information desk kahan milegi? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Information desks Islamabad International Airport mein multiple strategic locations par available hain takay passengers easily help access kar sakein. Main information desk central departure hall mein waqe hai jahan easily visible signage hai. Additional information points hain: arrival hall mein international passengers ke liye, security checkpoint ke qareeb, aur some gate areas mein. Information desk staff multilingual hai aur English, Urdu, aur regional languages mein communicate kar sakta hai. Services provided include: general airport information jaise terminal layout, gate locations, facility directions, flight information aur updates about delays, cancellations, ya gate changes, lost and found assistance, wheelchair aur special assistance requests, directions to restaurants, shops, lounges, aur other facilities, local transportation information jaise taxis, buses, aur car rentals, hotel recommendations aur booking assistance, tourist information about Islamabad aur Pakistan, aur emergency assistance aur coordination with security ya medical services. Staff trained hai handle karne ko various passenger inquiries aur typically friendly aur helpful hai. Agar aap ko kisi bhi facility ya service ke baare mein confusion hai, information desk first point of contact hai. Desk hours usually early morning se late night tak hain flight schedules ke sath align ho kar. Busy times par wait time ho sakta hai, lekin staff quickly assist karne ki koshish karta hai. Free brochures, maps, aur pamphlets bhi information desk par available hain.

query: Kya airport mein pharmacy hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan, pharmacy ya medical store Islamabad International Airport ke departure terminal mein available hai jo basic medications aur health products bechti hai. Pharmacy typically Gate 4 ke qareeb location par hai aur convenient hours mein khuli rehti hai usually subah 7 bajay se raat 10 bajay tak, lekin exact timings vary kar sakti hain. Available products mein shamil hain: over-the-counter medications jaise pain relievers (paracetamol, ibuprofen), cold aur flu medicines, antacids for stomach issues, anti-diarrhea medicines, allergy medications (antihistamines), motion sickness tablets, first aid supplies jaise bandages, antiseptic creams, thermometers, basic health monitoring devices jaise BP monitors, personal care items aur hygiene products, vitamins aur supplements, aur limited baby care products jaise formula milk, diapers. Prescription medications limited selection mein available ho sakte hain, lekin better hai ke apni own prescribed medicines carry karein especially chronic conditions ke liye. Pharmacist basic health advice bhi de sakta hai aur suitable over-the-counter options recommend kar sakta hai. Prices airport pharmacy mein city pharmacies se thode zyada ho sakte hain. Agar aap ko specific medication chahiye jo wahan nahi hai, pharmacist alternative suggest kar sakta hai. Travel health essentials jaise jet lag pills, sleep aids, aur digestive enzymes bhi mil sakte hain. Emergency medical situations ke liye, medical center Gate 2 par better option hai jahan doctors available hain.

query: Airport lounge mein kya kya facilities hain? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Premium lounge Islamabad International Airport mein comprehensive facilities provide karta hai comfortable aur relaxing experience ke liye. Gate 7 ke qareeb waqe lounge mein yeh amenities included hain: Food aur Beverages - complimentary buffet with hot meals (Pakistani aur international cuisine), variety of snacks jaise samosas, sandwiches, fruits, bakery items, unlimited beverages including tea, coffee, juices, soft drinks, aur kuch lounges mein limited alcoholic beverages bhi; Seating aur Comfort - comfortable recliners aur sofas, quiet zones for rest, individual workstations for business travelers; Technology - free high-speed WiFi throughout lounge, charging stations with multiple ports, business center with computers, printers, photocopiers, aur scanners, international newspapers aur magazines, TV screens with news aur entertainment channels; Washroom Facilities - clean aur well-maintained restrooms, shower facilities with towels aur toiletries, personal grooming products; Additional Services - flight information displays, assistance with rebooking ya inquiries, limited meeting rooms (availability par dependent), aur concierge services. Lounge environment peaceful hai away from crowded terminal. Air conditioning ya heating maintained hai for optimal comfort. Staff attentive hai aur regularly replenish food aur drinks. Some lounges mein spa ya massage chairs bhi ho sakte hain. Access usually 3-4 hours se pehle ki flight ke liye allowed hai. Guest policies vary - kuch lounges allow karte hain additional guests for a fee.

query: Kya duty free shopping available hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan bilkul! Duty-free shopping Islamabad International Airport mein international departure area mein available hai security checkpoint ke baad. Duty-free shop mein wide range of products hai discounted prices par kyunki taxes aur duties waived hain international travelers ke liye. Available categories: Perfumes aur Cosmetics - international brands jaise Chanel, Dior, Estee Lauder, MAC, luxury fragrances aur skincare products; Alcohol aur Tobacco - imported wines, spirits, champagne, cigarettes, cigars (restrictions apply based on destination country); Electronics - headphones, cameras, watches, gadgets; Fashion Accessories - branded sunglasses, bags, wallets, scarves; Chocolates aur Confectionery - international brands jaise Toblerone, Lindt, Ferrero Rocher, gift boxes; Local Products - Pakistani handicrafts, traditional items, souvenirs. Shopping karte waqt remember karein: duty-free only international passengers ke liye hai proper boarding pass ke sath, liquid restrictions apply if purchased before security (lekin duty-free se baad mein no problem), destination country ki customs limits check karein especially alcohol aur tobacco ke liye, prices compare karein kyunki kabhi kabhi airport duty-free bhi expensive ho sakta hai regular stores se, aur payment methods include cash (PKR aur major foreign currencies) aur credit/debit cards. Staff multilingual hai aur assist kar sakti hai. Products typically sealed bags mein di jati hain jo flight tak nahi kholni chahiye. Purchase receipts save karein customs declaration ke liye.

query: Kahan se airport ka map mil sakta hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Airport map ya terminal layout Islamabad International Airport ka kai ways se mil sakta hai: Information Desk - free printed maps available hain jo detailed terminal layout dikhate hain with all facilities marked, yeh maps usually Urdu aur English dono mein hain. Digital Displays - interactive touchscreen kiosks poore terminal mein installed hain jo digital map provide karte hain 'You Are Here' marker ke sath, yeh kiosks allow karte hain ke aap specific facilities search karein aur directions paye. Mobile App - agar airport ka official mobile app hai to download kar ke detailed map aur real-time navigation mil sakti hai. Website - airport ki official website par downloadable PDF maps available hain jo aap print kar sakte hain travel se pehle. Signage - comprehensive directional signage poore terminal mein hai jo major facilities ki taraf guide karta hai including gates, restrooms, food court, lounges. Map features jo typically included hain: gate numbers aur locations, check-in counters, security checkpoints, baggage claim areas, restrooms, prayer rooms, medical center, information desks, restaurants aur cafes, shops aur duty-free, ATMs aur currency exchange, taxi stands aur transportation, parking areas. Maps mein usually color coding hoti hai different zones ke liye aur symbols standardized hote hain. Agar printed map chahiye, to information desk se free copy request karein. Staff bhi verbally directions de sakta hai agar map confusing lag raha ho.

query: Kya airport mein hotel hai ya nearby? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Direct airport ke andar hotel nahi hai, lekin Islamabad International Airport ke bahut qareeb multiple hotel options available hain different budget ranges mein. Airport ke vicinity mein hotels: Airport Hotels (walking distance within 5-10 minutes) - usually 3-4 star category with shuttle service, facilities include comfortable rooms, restaurants, WiFi, gym; Mid-range Hotels (2-5 km radius) - affordable options with basic amenities, airport pickup/drop service available; Luxury Hotels (Islamabad city mein, 20-30 km) - 5-star properties with full services agar aap extended stay chahte hain. Hotel booking: advance online booking through websites like Booking.com, Hotels.com, ya direct hotel websites recommended hai, information desk airport par hotel recommendations aur booking assistance provide kar sakta hai, kuch hotels mein airport desk bhi hota hai arrival area mein, taxi drivers bhi hotel suggestions de sakte hain lekin confirm karein ke wo commission base recommendations nahi hain. Hotel amenities typically: free airport shuttle (confirm timing advance mein), 24-hour check-in for late night arrivals, luggage storage agar early check-out ya late flight hai, dining options, meeting rooms for business travelers. Layover passengers: agar aap ka long layover hai (6+ hours), to day-use rooms kuch hotels mein available hain without overnight stay. Prices vary PKR 5,000 se lekar 20,000+ per night tak depending on hotel category aur season. Transit hotels specifically designed for short stays zyada convenient hain.

query: Food court mein kya options hain? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport ka food court diverse dining options provide karta hai local aur international cuisine ke sath. Food court central location par hai easily accessible sabhi passengers ko. Available dining options: International Fast Food Chains - KFC for fried chicken, Subway for sandwiches aur subs, McDonald's (agar available ho), Pizza Hut for pizzas aur Italian items; Local Pakistani Restaurants - Taste of Pakistan jo authentic Pakistani dishes serve karta hai jaise biryani, karahi, nihari, haleem, various kebabs, traditional breakfast items like paratha aur chanay; Cafes aur Bakeries - Dunkin Donuts, local bakeries with fresh bread, cakes, pastries, cookies; Quick Service - snack bars with samosas, sandwiches, burgers, wraps; Beverages - tea stalls with desi chai, coffee shops, juice bars with fresh fruit juices aur smoothies. Dining considerations: prices airport mein city restaurants se slightly higher hain, operating hours vary but most places open early morning to late night, seating area shared hai with tables aur chairs, payment methods include cash aur cards mostly, halal food standards maintained hain as per Islamic requirements, vegetarian options bhi available hain though limited compared to non-veg. Popular items: for quick bite - samosa, sandwich, burger; for full meal - biryani plate, chicken karahi with naan; for breakfast - paratha with chanay, omelette; for snacks - pakora, french fries, pizza slice; for beverages - chai, coffee, fresh juice. Family dining areas with high chairs for babies bhi available hain. Takeaway bhi possible hai agar aap apne gate par le jana chahte hain. Nutritional information limited hai lekin staff se ingredients ke baare mein pooch sakte hain.

query: Kya airport mein barber shop ya salon hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Limited grooming services Islamabad International Airport mein available hain. Premium lounge mein basic grooming facilities ho sakti hain like shaving kits, combs, aur mirrors, lekin dedicated full-service barber shop ya beauty salon typically airport terminal mein nahi hai. Alternative options: nearby airport hotels mein salon services available ho sakti hain jo passengers ko accommodate kar sakte hain appointment ke sath, city mein proper salons aur barber shops 20-30 minutes drive par available hain extensive services ke liye, premium lounge mein limited grooming amenities jaise razors, shaving cream, aftershave, hair combs available hain self-service ke liye, pharmacy aur convenience stores personal grooming products bechte hain jaise combs, hair gel, deodorant jo aap quickly use kar sakte hain restroom mein. Typical grooming needs ke liye: clean shave - men's restroom mein aap apna own razor use kar sakte hain, hair fixing - comb aur hair products pharmacy se available hain, makeup - ladies restroom mein proper lighting aur mirrors hain, nail care - limited manicure kits convenience stores mein. Long layovers aur early morning flights ke liye yeh facilities helpful ho sakti hain freshen up karne ke liye. Future mein agar airport expand hota hai to dedicated salon service add ho sakti hai jaise kuch international airports mein hoti hai.

query: Baggage wrapping service kahan hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Baggage wrapping aur packing services Islamabad International Airport mein check-in counters ke qareeb available hain departure terminal mein. Yeh service aap ki luggage ko protective plastic wrapping mein wrap karti hai additional security aur protection ke liye. Baggage wrapping benefits: protection against scratches, dirt, aur weather damage during handling, tamper deterrent jo unauthorized opening ko prevent karta hai aur aap ko peace of mind deta hai, easier identification kyunki wrapped bags stand out on baggage carousel, leakage prevention agar aap liquids ya fragile items pack kiye hain. Service process: aap apna bag wrapping station par le jayein, staff proper size ki plastic wrap use karega aur machine se tightly wrap karega covering all sides, handles aur wheels usually exposed rahte hain easy handling ke liye, price based on bag size - typically PKR 200-500 per bag, payment cash ya card se kar sakte hain, process quick hai usually 5-10 minutes per bag. When to use: international travel especially to countries jahan baggage handling rough hai, expensive luggage ko protect karne ke liye, bags with multiple pockets jo easily open ho sakte hain, gifts ya fragile items jo extra protection chahte hain. Important: wrapping ke baad agar security random check select karti hai to aap ko wrapping open karni par sakti hai for inspection aur phir rewrap karwani hogi. Wrapping karane se pehle ensure karein ke aap ki baggage properly packed hai aur locked hai. Alternative: aap apna own plastic wrap bhi la sakte hain aur DIY kar sakte hain lekin airport service zyada professional aur secure hai.

query: Kya airport mein porter service available hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan, porter services Islamabad International Airport mein available hain jo aap ki heavy luggage carry karne mein madad karte hain. Porters licensed aur uniformed hote hain aur airport ke entrance, arrival area, aur check-in counters ke qareeb readily available hain. Porter assistance useful hai when: aap ke paas multiple heavy bags hain, aap elderly hain ya physical limitations hain, aap children ke sath travel kar rahe hain aur hands full hain, aap time-sensitive situation mein hain aur quickly move karna chahte hain. Porter services include: baggage trolley arrange karna, bags ko entry se check-in counter tak le jana, check-in process mein assistance, check-in se security ya gate tak bags carry karna arrival par, bags ko aircraft se baggage claim tak track karna aur collect karna, baggage claim se taxi stand ya pickup point tak transport. Porter fees: officially set rates hain but typically PKR 200-500 per bag depending on distance aur bag size, heavy ya extra large bags ka charge zyada ho sakta hai, tip additional hai aur aap ki marzi par based - typically PKR 100-300 appreciate ki jati hai, payment cash mein preferred hai. How to engage porter: simply approach uniformed porter jo usually entry par khara hota hai, clearly communicate karein kahan tak help chahiye (check-in tak ya gate tak), agree on price pehle if possible to avoid disputes later, ensure porter aap ki bags carefully handle kar raha hai aur aap ki nazar mein rahe. Security reminder: porter se kabhi apna bag unattended na chhodein, valuable items aur documents apne carry-on mein rakhein, phir bhi porter ko trust karein kyunki wo licensed professional hai.

query: Airport ki free shuttle service hai kya? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Islamabad International Airport ki official internal shuttle service terminals ke beech currently limited hai kyunki airport ek main terminal structure hai. Lekin transportation options available hain: Within Airport Complex - moving walkways (travelators) long corridors mein installed hain jo aap ko walk karne mein assist karte hain especially agar gate door hai, golf carts ya electric vehicles kabhi available hain mobility-impaired passengers ya elderly ko transport karne ke liye on request. External Shuttle Services - kuch nearby hotels apni complimentary shuttle service offer karte hain guests ko airport se hotel tak le jane ke liye aur vice versa, is service ko use karne ke liye hotel se pehle confirm karein timings aur pickup location, hotel shuttle typically designated area se depart karti hai arrivals ke bahar. City Shuttle ya Bus Service - Islamabad aur Rawalpindi city tak public transport buses aur shuttles available hain fixed routes aur schedules par, prices affordable hain typically PKR 100-200 per person, schedule aur routes information desk par available hain. Private Transfer Services - pre-booked private car services aur app-based rides like Careem, Uber (agar available ho), hotel transfers jo charge karte hain but convenient hain. Parking Shuttle - long-term parking areas se terminal tak shuttle buses operate hoti hain regularly jo passengers ko unki cars se terminal tak le jati hain, yeh service typically free hai ya parking fee mein included. Free shuttle within terminal zones planned ho sakti hai future expansion mein jaise international airports mein hoti hai.

query: Kya water fountain ya drinking water free hai? — plz confirm.
expected_response: Ji haan bilkul! Free drinking water fountains aur refill stations Islamabad International Airport ke terminal mein multiple locations par installed hain. Yeh facilities accessible hain poore terminal mein including: gate areas ke qareeb jahan passengers wait kar rahe hote hain, main seating zones mein, security checkpoint ke baad departure lounge mein, restrooms ke qareeb kai locations par.
